constituent: small bell, metal, gold, orders, meeting, chop-seal, hanko
koohiiStory1: Some restaurants have a small gold bell to call someone to take customers´ orders.
koohiiStory2: In high society, people ring a small golden bell to call their servants and give their orders.
readingExamples: 電鈴 (でんれい), 振鈴 (しんすず), 予鈴 (よれい), 鈴 (すず)
